name: Gather the Curses
description:
It's the day before Christmas and all through the night,

Some Hooligan has left vile curses before Santa's flight!

As one of Santa's little helpers, collect the curse words scattered,

Before Santa's feeble heart becomes shattered.

you can exit the game anytime by pressing ESC.

Also, made everything myself except the song (credit below).

Theme: Cursemas Eve

achievements: Iron Triangle, Maverick

would've had Healthy living too, but had to cut sleep down to only 4 hours Saturday due to my car being in the shop costing me almost 6 hours of the day :S

Song: Peek-Door Quest
by: Rolemusic
URL: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/~/Peek-Door_Quest
